product_highlights: Rich in proteins, lactose, lactic acid, vitamins, minerals
notes: Ramosu is a Korean skincare brand offering Bifida Ferment Lysate 100, a high-concentration probiotic active ingredient. The ferment lysate is rich in proteins, lactose, lactic acid, vitamins, and minerals, providing comprehensive skin benefits. Known for reducing allergic reactions and increasing skin absorption, making it suitable for sensitive skin formulations. Korean expertise in fermentation and skincare innovation ensures premium quality. Available in consumer-friendly packaging, also suitable for professional formulators seeking high-quality Korean probiotic actives.
